alert.note: Alert for Carson City; Churchill; Douglas; Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 30 at 10:57AM PST until January 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in California...Nevada... Truckee River Near Truckee affecting Placer and Nevada Counties. West Fork Carson River At Woodfords affecting Alpine and Douglas Counties. East Fork Carson River Below Markleeville affecting Alpine and Douglas Counties. Carson River Near Carson City affecting Carson City, Churchill, Douglas and Lyon independent cities. For the Truckee River...including Truckee, Farad, Reno, Vista, Wadsworth...elevated river levels are forecast. For the West Fork Carson River...including Woodfords...elevated river levels are forecast. For the East Fork Carson River...including Markleeville, Gardnerville...elevated river levels are forecast. For the Mainstem Carson River...including Carson City...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Carson River Near Carson City. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:50 AM PST Friday the stage was 3.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.8 feet Sunday morning. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by tomorrow morning.
